attributes.action: remove Sir Fred Goodwin's knighthood in light of the failure of RBS.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Fred Goodwin ran RBS and presided over a bank which lent aggressively and acquired businesses recklessly. This has led to massive value destruction and financial hardship for many. His retention of his Knighthood in these circumstances is indefensible.

rejection.details: This is a matter for direct communication with the Honours Committee.
reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
